abstract: Goldman Sachs‘ Lloyd C. Blankfein has lapped his rivals at other investment banks this year. But who knew he would outshine Warren E. Buffett, the legendary investor, and the three guys behind the Internet giant Google?
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs‘ Lloyd C. Blankfein has lapped his rivals at other investment banks this year. But who knew he would outshine Warren E. Buffett, the legendary investor, and the three guys behind the Internet giant Google?

headline.main: Blankfein Tops Buffett in Fortune’s Power List
